detail_desc: Tops in soft slub cotton jersey with short puff sleeves, concealed press-studs on one shoulder, a scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, buttons at the front and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Platform ankle boots in imitation leather with lacing at the front and a zip at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 3 cm, covered heels 11.5 cm.
Short-sleeved bodysuit in cotton jersey with a lace collar and press-studs at the back and crotch.
Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and buttons down the front.
Sleeveless dress in pleated, patterned chiffon with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a decorative flower at the top. Jersey lining.

Set in soft cotton jersey. Top with short, lace butterfly sleeves, a pleat at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Elasticated hairband with a decorative knot.

Set in soft cotton jersey. Top with short, lace butterfly sleeves, a pleat at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Leggings with an elasticated waist. Elasticated hairband with a decorative knot.

Jumpsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a wrapover opening at the back with two buttons at the back of the neck and a tie at the base. Short, flounced sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and straight, ankle-length legs.
Set with a top and leggings in printed cotton jersey. Top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Set with a top and leggings in printed cotton jersey. Top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Set with a top and leggings in printed cotton jersey. Top with an opening and button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Lace body with flounced sleeves, flounces at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Narrow, elasticated seam at the hips and a lined gusset with concealed press-studs.
High-waisted trousers in stretch twill with an embroidered motif at the top, a concealed zip at one side and slim legs.
Microfibre and lace suspender belt with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Suede ankle boots with peep toes and a frayed-end drawstring on the shaft. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Suede ankle boots with peep toes and a frayed-end drawstring on the shaft. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Trousers in cotton corduroy with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastening. Side pockets, fake welt pockets at the back and straight, wide legs with pleats at the top and creases down the front.
Trousers in stretch twill with adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, side pockets and fake back pockets. Detachable, adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Trousers in stretch twill with adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, side pockets and fake back pockets. Detachable, adjustable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Plastic hair claw. Size 7x9 cm.
Short jersey dress with long sleeves.
Soft jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist with a press-stud, fake fly, and decorative seams on the legs.
Short, straight-cut coat in a textured weave with concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Double-breasted twill coat in a viscose blend with notch lapels, welt side pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a tab and metal D-rings at the waist, zip fly and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with a decorative seam down the front and slit at the front of the hems.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a tab and metal D-rings at the waist, zip fly and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with a decorative seam down the front and slit at the front of the hems.
Coat in a cotton weave with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, seam at the waist and flare to the hem. Lined.

Set with a long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey and twill dungarees. Top with press-studs on one shoulder. Dungarees with adjustable straps with press-studs, a chest pocket and a seam at the waist. Fake front and back pockets, one leg pocket, press-studs at the sides and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs in sizes 4-12M.
Pyjamas in soft, patterned jersey. Short-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short slits and ties at the sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short slits and ties at the sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short slits and ties at the sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short slits and ties at the sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with elastication and a frill trim at the top. Short slits and ties at the sleeve-ends, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with frills and press-studs on the shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Shirt in soft washed denim with a collar, contrasting-colour press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button and seams on the shoulders and back. Rounded hem.
Cardigan in a soft, fine cotton knit with long raglan sleeves, buttons down the front, fake front pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey in a slightly A-line style with a press-stud on one shoulder, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and slits in the sides. Slightly longer, rounded hem at the back.

Short-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey in a slightly A-line style with a press-stud on one shoulder, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and slits in the sides. Slightly longer, rounded hem at the back.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and lacing down the legs.
Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and lacing down the legs.
Knee-length running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist.Crotch and side stripes in ventilating mesh. Jersey inner shorts.
Knee-length running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist.Crotch and side stripes in ventilating mesh. Jersey inner shorts.
Knee-length running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist.Crotch and side stripes in ventilating mesh. Jersey inner shorts.
Jumper knitted in a soft alpaca blend in a relaxed fit. Contrasting colour yoke that continues down the sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pull-on trousers in woven fabric with a regular, elasticated waist and straight legs with multicoloured stripes down the sides.
Shirt dress in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a tie belt at the waist and slits in the sides of the hem.

Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a wrapover drawstring hood, worn details and reverse-stitched seams. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a raw-edge hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Metal watch with sparkly stones on its face, Diameter of face 3.5 cm, width of links approx. 1.5 cm, length of bracelet approx. 22 cm.
Small suede purse with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 10x13 cm.
Soft leather and suede pouch with a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Twill lining. Size 15x22 cm.
Soft leather and suede pouch with a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Twill lining. Size 15x22 cm.
Soft leather and suede pouch with a zip at the top and one inner compartment. Twill lining. Size 15x22 cm.
Knee-length lace skirt with transparent lower sections and a zip in the side. Lined at the top.
Blouse in a viscose-blend weave with a spot print, collar with long, wide ties and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, long  puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood with an embroidered motif on the sides. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Shirt in a woven cotton blend with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Shirt in a woven cotton blend with a grandad collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in sturdy, patterned jersey.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and short sleeves trimmed with a gathered frill.
Tops in soft cotton jersey with a gathered frill around the neckline and short sleeves trimmed with a gathered frill.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front and concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Patterned leggings with an elasticated waist. Patterned hairband with a sewn-on bow.

Sleeveless dress in glittery tulle with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist with a sewn-in velvet ribbon and bow, and a straight-cut skirt with several layers of pleated flounces. Lined.

Sleeveless lace romper suit with a flounce around the neckline and press-studs at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist, press-studs at the crotch and narrow elastication around the legs. Lined.

Sleeveless lace romper suit with a flounce around the neckline and press-studs at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist, press-studs at the crotch and narrow elastication around the legs. Lined.
